text: prognathia 50% Obesity 50% Reduced bone mineral density 50% Scoliosis 50% Single transverse palmar crease 50% Venous insufficiency 50% Abnormality of calvarial morphology 7.5% Abnormality of the mitral valve 7.5% Neoplasm 7.5% Type II diabetes mellitus 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
